input.sentences: [male] is the captain of the flames .
the group wolfing down their grub .
[female] did n't get quite enough to eat .
[male] eating like a savage like usual .
output.sentences: A group of friends gather for a party, the host prepares a barbecue grill by lighting a flame.
Like wolves, they eat the grub that was prepared.
One of the guests, pretends to bite her friend, as if she's so hungry she could eat her.
Another guest licks his plate as he's finishing up his meal.
The party is a success, as you can see, by the smiles and laughs on all the guests faces.
